ðŸ“– Summary: Linkwarden is a self-hosted collaborative bookmark manager designed to collect, organize, and preserve webpages. It automatically captures screenshots and PDFs of saved links, ensuring accessibility even if the original content disappears. The platform supports collaboration, allowing users to share links, organize them into collections, and customize member permissions.
